name: Peggy Howard
text: Pizza was good till I found a light brown medium length hair. Then it was over. I didn't order the special toppings

name: Jason
text: Amazing staff,small mix up on a pickup order. Well compensated, way above what I thought was necessary. Thank you very much pizza and wings were delicious. I would definitely recommend this Pizza Hut. Willard Mo. Branch

name: Susan Reaves
text: First time ordering from Pizza Hut here. (I’m relocated from the southeast). I’ll have to say y’all have it just right!!  Fantastic pizza and sides.  Better service than I’ve gotten back home. …More

name: David Drayton
text: Pizza hut is always great. Not too long of a waiting period, considering that the order was placed in the store. Didn't call ahead or order online. They were very courteous, kind, and considerate. Plus the total came to $16.20, which is …More

name: J P
text: I have eaten here a few times. The pizza is the worst ever. Never has any toppings. And when you pay more for more toppings they take away from the other toppings. I will never order pizza from here again. I rather by a Walmart deli pizza …More

name: Joanel Sander
text: Pizza was not what I ordered. I ordered hand-tossed super supreme no pepperoni. When I got home I am not sure what it was. It had pepperoni, but in all honesty he told me that he forgot and put it on. It had hardly anything on it and was a …More

name: Flutter Fly
text: Pretty good delivery order tonight and it was probably only about 20 minutes to get it. Chicken teriyaki wings are sooo good!

name: Joy Medcalf
text: BEST customer service. Jeremy usually is who takes my order. Very polite and my order is always right. Never have had a bad experience.

name: Bob and Susan Brandon
text: Pizza Hut is always yummy. It did seem like the crust was especially huge and all the toppings were in the middle. But for $5 it was decent.

name: mark brownfield
text: I will never in the rest of my years but a pizza from them 36.70 for 2 pizzas pappa murfies hear I come pizza hut can't kiss my behind

name: Breaughna Dearman
text: We eat here a lot and it’s usually okay. But tonight our order was suppose to be done in 15 mins, we got there and were told they were out of cookies so we waited another 30 mins for a brownie. When we got home our pizzas were cold and …More

name: Kylie White
text: Carry out is awesome. Dine in was the worst experience I’ve had. I’ve worked in the food service industry and being rude to customers who haven’t done anything to provoke an attitude is very unprofessional.

name: Sarah Hurd
text: Great food and service, didn't wait long at all. I highly recommend the pan crust.

name: Seth Renshaw
text: Eaten here before. Never been overly impressed with the cleanliness of this restaurant, I think it speaks to the personal pride on the job or lack thereof. Majority of employees seem to be just there to work, no pride seems to be taken in …More

name: Lyndsay Sneed
text: From this specific location you never know if your pizza will: 1) arrive on time, 2) have the proper amount of toppings for a whole pizza, 3) be thoroughly cooked. Sometimes it's amazing and others it's a gamble.

name: melissa spurlock
text: Made great accommodations for pizza party.

name: Amy Hall
text: Always great food and service!

name: Wendy Coffey
text: One of the best pizza huts around

name: Devin Boyd
text: Great food good people

name: Brandon Beasley
text: Yesterday I ordered out for delivery. I live about five minutes down the road. I ordered a pizza, wings, and a chicken Alfredo. I was quoted 25-30 minutes my food did not arrive until an hour after I called. When the food arrived the pizza …More

name: sarah bock
text: I called in a large order and was told a good tip was expected since I didn't give but 2 hours of notice. When getting there all my.pizzas we're sitting out on counter and half of them were cold by the time I got there. I did leave a tip but was unhappy of how it was handled.

name: Lynette McEntire
text: Good price. Everyone was friendly even though they were short staffed and busy!

name: David H.
text: Hands down the best customer service and fast food pizza

name: Dana Price
text: Friendly home town environment, great workers!

name: Cierra Forrester
text: Waited 40 minutes for them to run back and get wings they initially forgot. I live 3 minutes away. Then we finally got the wings and they were the wrong ones. I wish they could get it together (:

name: Zachary Kettering
text: Tasty

name: Leon Bryant
text: Best place to eat in Willard and the employees care about the customer service.

text: Pizza was great but wait was a little long - not typical though.

name: Seth Bruce
text: Nice employees and good service ty

name: Kirby Butts

name: David Garver

name: Todd Hale
text: Pizza was great hot and fast just the way I like it

name: Brad Hall
text: Good consistent pizza. We order from here often and our order is always correct.

name: mark jones
text: Friendly and fast. Great for lunch

name: Katharina Dodson
text: I ordered a pepperoni pizone, plus 3 other items. The pizone had only 2 slices of pepperoni and a tiny amount of cheese. It was almost only bread. Worst pizone I have ever had.

name: James J Carotenuti
text: The staff was great. They helped my daughter prepare my grandson's formula bottle when it needed warming.

name: Carl Soper
text: Un real unhappy place. Dine in rude

text: This is a lovely little Pizza Hut, probably the best I have eaten at.

name: Glen Burgess
text: Good pizza, great for feeding the masses or just giving yourself a break from cooking.

name: iuliascu
text: I would give them 5 star rating, but because the last three times I ordered take out, the pizza had raw dough.

name: Patrick Flynn
text: Employees here are pretty funny and make it a fun experience.

name: Rick West

text: Always great pizza and friendly service. They are (for the most) always willing to go out of there way to help me get the right amount of what I need.

text: Very good ! Got extra toppings because of a longer than normal wait time. That's Customer service !

text: Best crew and management. Friendly folks and reliable....better than other business in town.

name: luke hudson
text: They are quick and always get it right. Clean place to eat. Backyard BBQ chicken is my favorite.

text: Food is great. Unfortunately it is a corporate store.
